name: Bashundhara Projects
description: The Stone Project is an innovative endeavor aimed at exploring the diverse applications and properties of stones. Stones have been an essential part of human civilization for thousands of years, serving various purposes in construction, art, and cultural heritage. This project aims to delve into the realm of stones, uncover their hidden potential, and showcase their versatility in modern society.
